Follow.title: Follow Relationship
Follow.description: Represents a follow relationship between two users.

SavedMovie.title: Saved Movie

SavedTvShow.title: Saved TV Show
SavedTvShow.description: Represents a TV show saved by a user.

UserMovieRating.description: Represents a rating given by a user to a movie.

UserTvShowRating.title: User TV Show Rating
UserTvShowRating.description: Represents a rating given by a user to a TV show.

rating.description: The rating given by the user (e.g., 1-10).

UserMovieReview.title: User Movie Review
UserMovieReview.description: A review for a movie written by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the review.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

photoURL.description: The profile picture URL of the user.

content.description: The text content of the review.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the review was created.

rating.description: The rating given along with the review.

UserTvShowReview.title: User TV Show Review
UserTvShowReview.description: A review for a TV show written by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the review.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

photoURL.description: The profile picture URL of the user.

content.description: The text content of the review.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the review was created.

rating.description: The rating given along with the review.

WatchParty.title: Watch Party
WatchParty.description: Represents a scheduled watch party for a specific movie.

movieId.description: The ID of the movie for the watch party.

moviePosterPath.description: The poster path of the movie.

scheduledAt.description: The scheduled date and time of the watch party.

hostId.description: The UID of the user hosting the party.

hostDisplayName.description: The display name of the host.

hostPhotoURL.description: The profile picture URL of the host.

Rsvp.title: RSVP
Rsvp.description: Represents a user's RSVP to a watch party.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a watch party chat.

MovieClub.title: Movie Club
MovieClub.description: Represents a user-created group for discussing movies.

description.description: A short description of the club.

creatorId.description: The UID of the user who created the club.

creatorName.description: The display name of the creator.

creatorPhotoURL.description: The profile picture URL of the creator.

isPublic.description: Whether the club is public or private.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the club was created.

ClubMember.title: Club Member
ClubMember.description: Represents a member of a movie club.

role.description: The role of the member in the club.

ClubPost.title: Club Post
ClubPost.description: A post or message in a movie club's discussion thread.

ClubRecommendation.title: Club Recommendation
ClubRecommendation.description: A movie recommendation shared within a movie club.
